title: $2.25 million settlement for Painesville man who sustained brain damage after being shot with Taser
text:
Published By: Cleveland.com: Crime - Today 
A Painesville man will receive $2.25 million per a settlement with the city for brain damage he suffered in 2010, when a police officer shot...
